data.meta_description: Obituary for Mary L.  Hotham | Hotham, Mary L. ,89 of Delaware, Ohio, formerly of Johnstown, passed away November 8, 2016 at Riverside Methodist Hospital, Ohio. Born September 23, 1927 in Johnstown, daughter of Metro and Mary...
data.meta_site_name: Mary Hotham  Obituary | November 8, 2016 | Geisel Funeral Home - Johnstown, PA
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
